LanguageData.MakeCloth.label: weave twenty cloths
LanguageData.MakeCloth.description: weave cloth from raw cotton. \n\nMakes 20 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeLinen.label: weave ten linen cloths
LanguageData.MakeLinen.description: weave linen cloth from raw flax. \n\nMakes 10 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeHempCloth.label: weave ten hemp cloths
LanguageData.MakeHempCloth.description: Turn smokeleaf leaves into a hemp cloth.
LanguageData.MakePlasteelThread.label: craft twenty-five plasteel threads
LanguageData.MakePlasteelThread.description: Spin plasteel thread from plasteel metal. Used in advanced cloth weaving. \n\n Makes 25 Threads.
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadCloth.label: weave ten synthread cloth
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadCloth.description: weave synthread cloth from raw cotton, raw flax, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 10 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrand.label: weave twelve devilstrand cloths
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrand.description: weave devilstrand cloth from raw devilstrand. \n\nMakes 12 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveCloth.label: weave fifteen hyperweave cloths
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveCloth.description: weave hyperweave cloth from mixing raw cotton, raw flax, raw devilstrand, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 15 cloths.
LanguageData.Makeblendedwool.label: craft twenty blended wool
LanguageData.Makeblendedwool.description: Blend wools from other blends of wool. \n\nMakes 20 wool.
LanguageData.Makeblendedcloth.label: weave twenty-five cloth from other fabric
LanguageData.Makeblendedcloth.description: Blend different fabrics into a simple cloth. \n\nMakes 25 cloth.
LanguageData.SalvageApparel.label: salvage apparel
LanguageData.SalvageApparel.description: Salvage unwanted apparel into raw materials.
